result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Maxie D Thompkins
Current: Racine Correctional Institution, 2019 Wisconsin Street, Sturtevant, WI 53177-1829 United States  (Effective: 11-01-2022)
Prior: 19701 Terrace Ave, Lynwood, IL 60411
PLEAH set for 11/1/22 adjourned to 11/21/22 at 11:00 am on court's motion; court unavailable on previously scheduled date.  Confirming email sent to parties.
Plea hearing on November 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.

3:45 PM Attorney Daniel Joseph Tombasco in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Maxie D Thompkins not in court. Attorney Chad A Shamali in court for Maxie D Thompkins. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Dodge Correctional could not accommodate a zoom appearance. Attorney Shamali advises the Court that the matter is almost resolved, but is requesting another adjournment. Court adjourns. The State will prepare writ for next hearing. TR cases continue to trail 22CF562.
Plea hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.   No appearance by the Defendant. Attorney Chad Shamali appeared on behalf of the Defendant.  Clerk N. Nobile.
NO RECORD: 22CF562/22TR3452-3453. Due to a mistunderstanding the DE was transport to KCJ after Attorney Shamali requested he appear by zoom and then DE was transferred back early this morning. Court will adjourn. Cases 22TR3452-3453 continue to trail 22CF652. Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 3:30 pm.

Defendant Maxie D Thompkins appeared with Attorney Chad A Shamali.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  ST called witness KSD Dep Keith Kirwan; sworn in and testified; cross-examination by Atty Shamali. ST rested and moved for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

106PM   Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Preliminary Hearing set on June 29, 2022 at 09:30 am before Comm , 927-54th Street, Room 157, Kenosha, WI.  Bond continued as previously set.  sg

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Defendant Maxie D Thompkins in court, in custody.  Attorney Andrew Joseph Burgoyne appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

01:29 PM    State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Christopher Bub.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on May 4, 2022 at 09:15 am.  $5000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Atty moves to dismiss counts #1 - arguments heard - Court denies motion.  ts
